name: Stay in your lane
description:
Stay in your lane is  a top-down racing game for desktop. The main objective of the game is to avoid cars and survive as long as possible to achieve a high score.

Your main goal in the game is to last as long as possible, but it isn't that simple as if you comes into contact with another vehicle you will loose a life, you start of with three and when they are done its end of the line, game over!

The only way you can stop this from happing is to switch between three lanes to swerve and avoid the other vehicles.

But you will have some power-ups that will help you out if you can collect them! 

  • Hearts - They will Replenish a life if you are missing them allowing you to make another mistake.
  • Clock - The clock will slow down time allowing you to make better decisions and have an easier time avoiding the other vehicles.

The controls for this game are very simple as it is just two keys:

  • W - This moves the vehicle upwards.
  • S - This moves the vehicle downwards.

Design Goal

  • To create simple system that works and interests the player.
  • The ability to incorporate game feel.
  • To be able to design and interesting endless game that keep the player engaged.
